Santa_Barbara.Bellosguardo Foundation: The Bellosguardo Foundation is a philanthropic organization and private foundation for the arts registered in the State of New York and operating out of 1407 East Cabrillo Boulevard in Santa Barbara, California. The arts foundation was formed posthumously by Huguette Clark as part of the settlement agreement for Clark's will. Clark, who died in 2011 at age 104, was the daughter of Sen.
